Html: Why I'm getting this problem? I defined a CustomModernWindow and its themes, but when i set it explicitly to my main window, I got that error. I already applied all the details from this page https://mui.codeplex.com/workitem/19702 (ModernWindow Implicit Style Not Working). just try if its work but its not. Another thing is, when I did'nt set a style from my main window, it works but the style I've added did'nt applied.
